title: Why the horrific heatwave in China matters to you

media:group.media:title: Why the horrific heatwave in China matters to you
media:group.media:description:
Get informed about the climate crisis on Nebula, bundled with CuriosityStream for 26% off! https://www.curiositystream.com/simonclark

I got married to pixel girl! Well, pixel wife now. And while we were on honeymoon, some huge climate news broke... some of which doesn't seem to have made it very far. In this video I talk about the climatic happenings of August - the floods in Pakistan and the drought in China - and about how you can stay more up to date about climate crisis.
